column4: basically, gtk-gnutella won't connect at all, and when azureus works, it is really slow. i have charter cable
Is the cable modem connected directly to the linux box, or is it going through some kind of router/firewall appiance?
You'll have to read up on how to set up your router for port forwarding then.  I beleive the gnutella site will have info as to what ports need to be forwarded.
